briefTitle: Developing Mouse Models of Breast Cancer Using Tissue Samples From Women With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Developing In-Vivo Models of Human Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Development of new in vivo models of human breast cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS:

* Diagnosis of breast cancer

  * Any stage of disease
  * Primary or metastatic disease
* Human breast tumor tissues available after the diagnoses have been made
* Enrolled on the ongoing Breast Tissue Repository trial VU-VICC-BRE-03103

  * Have consented to the use of their tissues for research purpose
* Hormone receptor status not specified

PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS:

* Menopausal status not specified

PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY:

* Not specified
